## Return delivered order

An order can only be returned if its status is 'delivered', and you should check its status before taking the action.

The user needs to confirm the order id and the list of items to be returned.

The user needs to provide a payment method to receive the refund.

The refund must either go to the original payment method, or an existing gift card.

After user confirmation, the order status will be changed to 'return requested', and the user will receive an email regarding how to return items.

According to the return policy, the refund must go to the original payment method or an existing gift card. Since the gold tablet in order #W9571698 was paid with a gift card, the refund can only be processed back to that gift card.

If you want the refund to go to your credit card, you would need to return the entire order #W3069600, which was paid with your credit card.

Would you like to proceed with returning the gold tablet from order #W9571698 with a refund to the gift card, or would you prefer to return the entire order #W3069600 for a refund to your credit card? Please confirm so I can assist you further.
